scripts.package: npm run package-lin && npm run package-win && npm run package-mac
scripts.package-lin: electron-packager ./ --platform linux --arch "ia32,x64" --asar true --out dist/ --overwrite --app-copyright "Copyright © 2017 Matthew Ross" --icon ./assets/icon
scripts.package-win: electron-packager ./ --platform win32 --arch "ia32,x64" --asar true --out dist/ --overwrite --app-copyright "Copyright © 2017 Matthew Ross" --icon ./assets/icon --win32metadata.FileDescription "A simple Markdown editor." --win32metadata.ProductName MdEdit --win32metadata.OriginalFilename MdEdit.exe --win32metadata.CompanyName "Matthew Ross"
scripts.package-mac: electron-packager ./ --platform darwin --arch "ia32,x64" --asar true --out dist/ --overwrite --app-copyright "Copyright © 2017 Matthew Ross" --icon ./assets/icon
